ComicInfo.Colorist: Ibrahim Aydin, Sanju Nivangune, Ylenia Di Napoli, Gwenaelle Dalgault, Chuck Oback, Ceci De La Cruz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: CB Zane, Jyn Leonard, Joel Souza, Keith Garvey, Adriano Olivera, Kodi, Greg Watson, Justin Hunt, Rafael Lanhellas, Courtney Rose
ComicInfo.Summary: Ace and Starlet have recently been reassigned and relocated to Grimsmont City. A change in orders has planted them both at an ice cream parlor located downtown. The facility is to serves as their new base of operations.After their recent encounter with the demoness, Lili Ardat, the girls patiently wait for their next assignment in hopes to encounter the demoness again. However C.I.D. â€“ Centralized Informative Database, a supercomputer, alerts them that they have been activated but with a different target. Alukah, a fearsome demon that drinks the blood of her victims. Their mission is to seek her out and capture her by any means necessary.
